course_title: Pediatric Acute Care Nurse Practitioner II
class_notes: Online asynchronous and synchronous face-to-face intensives dates: 6/10-6/11 & 7/8-7/9.
course_description: Students will plan interventions to stabilize the pediatric patient, minimize complications, promote physical/psychological well-being, restore maximal health potential and evaluate risk factors to achieving these outcomes. Simulation and clinical experiences for invasive skills and procedures.
prerequisites: NRSG 661or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 1759, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
